title: Interpretation of a dream about rain falling on a person by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about rain falling on a person, according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of dreams is one of the things that contribute to the process of presenting the events that a person experiences during sleep, and this contributes to reaching logic and realism that helps to enhance one’s logic. It is noteworthy that dreams can be a message or a main goal. The dreamer needs to know or pass it and there is a set of important rules through which dream interpretation can be used as much as possible. Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about rainWhen interpreting and interpreting a dream, it is necessary to look at the specific moment that the person experiences, and not the vision that comes during sleep Rain falling in a dream indicates harm, problems, and troubles in a person’s life, such as wars. Dreaming of rain falling in a dream from a window or door indicates a good sign, meaning safety and psychological comfort. Interpretation of rain falling in a dream and sunrise means that the problems will go away and that there is benefit and benefit. It will come.Interpretation of a dream about rain falling on a person alone. The dream can be interpreted contrary to what was stated in the dream, and this issue is invalidated in some cases when the interpretation of the dream is taken from the Holy Qur’an or the Sunnah of the Prophet. Only one person, evidence: The interpretation of this dream indicates the strong and gentle love relationship that the unmarried girl seeks. She is serious and honest in work and has strong feelings. The interpretation of a dream about light rain shows sweet words that make the heart happy, and heavy rain expresses strong affection for the person she loves. Interpretation of a dream about rain accompanied by thunder for a single woman indicates a feeling of fear and a desire to escape from a problem. Interpretation of dreams about rain falling on only two people. Dreams are interpreted based on the movements and not the stability that they are experiencing. A dream is a transition from one place and another time. It is noteworthy that the interpretation of the dream does not refer to the future, as it can be interpreted in the past at all. As for the interpretation of the dream of rain falling on two people, it appears: Rain falling on two people in a dream means that one of them will obtain great money and wealth in one day. Rain falling on the dreamer Evidence of the approaching pregnancy and childbirth. Rain falling on someone in a dream indicates a group of positive and correct changes in the person’s next life, and they must be paid attention to and preserved. Interpretation of a dream about rain indicates the upcoming great position, which is in the hands of many people. Interpretation of a dream about rain For a single woman, rain in a dream indicates a group of changes that a person may go through in his life, especially as it helps highlight interpretations of the reality by which the person changes. Dream Guide: A dream in the life of an unmarried woman indicates that many young men have made advances to her at this stage of her life. Heavy useless rain in a girl’s dream indicates the presence of a large number of friends in her life and this has a negative impact on the girl’s life. Rain indicates To the many benefits that the girl will receive in the next period of her life. Interpretation of a dream about rain falling on clothes for single women. Interpretation of dreams is

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing gold in a pregnant woman’s dream

preview.html: Seeing gold in a dream for a pregnant womanInterpreters believe that the dream indicates goodness and brings a lot of news to the dreamer, but it also carries some negative interpretations, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing gold for a pregnant woman in the language of son. Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Seeing gold in a dream for a pregnant woman Ibn SirinSeeing gold in a dream for a pregnant womanInterpretation of seeing gold for a pregnant woman heralds an increase in her wealth and that God Almighty will bless her with health and grant her many blessings and goodness. In the event that the dreamer faces some problems and difficulties in her life, the dream indicates To facilitate her affairs and remove worries from her shoulders. If the visionary feels stressed and upset and dreams that she found a lot of gold, this indicates an improvement in her psychological state, peace of mind and assurance. The dream indicates that her birth will be easy and smooth and she will have a good time, her future will be bright and she will enjoy happiness throughout her life In the arms of her husband and child. An indication that the pregnant woman will fulfill a certain desire or reach a certain goal that she has been seeking for a long time, and the vision symbolizes her great self-confidence that can reach the point of arrogance. Seeing gold in a dream for a pregnant woman Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that The vision is a bad omen, as it indicates the emergence of disturbing matters in the pregnant woman’s life and her feeling of sadness. If the dreamer sees herself wearing gold bracelets in a dream, this means that she will soon inherit a large sum of money, but if she sees herself in a dream melting gold, this leads to many From arguments with her future husband. Period. The vision indicates that she will soon work in a new job and achieve amazing success in it, despite the problems and troubles of pregnancy, but if a woman dreams that she lives in a house made of gold, this may lead to a fire. The section includes Interpretation of dreams on the Egyptian website From Google, you can see Many interpretations and questions from fans. Seeing a golden earring in a dream for a pregnant woman. If the earring is made of gold and silver, then the dream indicates that the dreamer feels tired and exhausted due to pregnancy, and indicates goodness and abundance in livelihood and blessing with health and money, and if the dreamer fears for her. The health and well-being of her fetus, as the dream brings her good news of improved health conditions and the continuity of her health and safety, and if the pregnant woman is in the first months of pregnancy and does not know the sex of the fetus. She saw herself wearing a golden earring, so the vision indicates the birth of boys. Interpretation of losing one golden earring in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation scholars believe that the dream is a bad omen, because it symbolizes the emergence of some health problems that negatively affect the health of her fetus and may lead to its loss. ) to protect her and provide her with health and well-being, and it was said that the vision indicates that she is going through some disputes with her husband’s family. Seeing a gold ring in a dream for a pregnant woman. The dream symbolizes the pregnant woman’s sense of stability in her married life, but if she dreams that she is removing a gold ring from her hand, this indicates her separation. About her husband, but seeing

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing seagulls in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a seagull in a dream: It is a water bird, as it is characterized by the presence of a large beak and wings, while it has a short neck, and it is a strong and powerful bird with a loud voice. A very intelligent bird, but what is the meaning of seeing a seagull in a dream? It is certain that seeing this bird in a dream has many indications and meanings, which we will learn about according to the interpretation of leading scholars and commentators. Interpretation of a dream about a seagull by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin also mentioned seeing birds in a A year that indicates ambition and achieving goals. Birds also reflect a feeling of happiness and enjoyment. Seeing bird eggs means getting money. Bird feathers indicate a good cause and abundant happiness. Seeing a seagull on your shoulders in a dream indicates the possibility of a good opportunity in a career. Seeing a seagull crashing in a dream means that a travel opportunity is approaching. Seeing a seagull is a sign On joy and pleasure. Interpretation of a dream of a seagull for a merchant: As for a merchant in a dream, seeing seagulls indicates profit in his trade. A seagull in a dream also indicates a lot of profit and success in trade. Interpretation of a dream of a lone seagull: Seeing seagulls on The ground is an unpleasant vision, symbolizing failure in reality. This vision also shows a financial crisis in reality. Seeing a seagull also indicates a desire to stay away from problems of opinion. A seagull in a dream indicates strength in reality. Some have interpreted that seeing seagulls In a dream, it is evidence of the need to give up a certain thing that this opinion does in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a seagull in the sky: Seeing seagulls in the sky means success, whether in social or professional life. It also indicates the arrival of good news to the dreamer. Seeing seagulls In a dream, it is a sign of love and loyalty. Interpretation of a dream about seagulls for a patient: Seeing a seagull in a patient’s dream indicates the death of that patient.

title: I dreamed that I fell into a deep well, and the color of the water was black

preview.html: I dreamed that I fell into a deep well, and the color of the water was black. Dreams are fantasies that a person sees during his sleep, and many people see that he falls into a hole or a well, so they resort to interpreting this dream on websites, and there are many indications of this dream, some positive and others negative. In general, a well in a dream indicates knowledge and money, and today through our article we will give you all the details and interpretations related to the interpretation of the dream in which I dreamed that I fell into a deep well, the color of the water is black. Interpretation of a well in a dream It may happen that a person sees a well in his dream or falls into it. A well, and the dreamer feels afraid of this dream, so he searches on the Internet for an interpretation of this dream. Here we present to you some interpretations of the dream of seeing a well in a dream, which are as follows: Seeing a well in a dream may indicate money and knowledge and may be a sign of imprisonment. But if you see yourself taking water from a well, this indicates success and progress in life. And when you see a well in a dream Empty, this indicates that the dreamer does not trust his relatives. If you see yourself falling into a well in a dream, this may indicate that you are facing some troubles and problems in life. As for seeing a dry well, this is a sign that the fortuneteller is tired of his work. And if you see a dry well, this is a sign that the fortuneteller is tired of his work. Your image is upside down in the well, as this is a sign of sadness, destruction, or death, and this is God, the highest and best. Interpretation of a dream about falling into a well: A dream or dream is considered a successive series of events that a person sees during his sleep, as the dream differs from one person to another according to the psychological state. First: When you dream that you Falling into a deep well, this indicates the exhaustion and tension that she is going through during this period. Second: If an unmarried girl sees me falling into a hole or a well, this is a sign to her that she is thinking a lot about her future affairs. Third: A man falling into a well in a dream indicates the presence of... Bad friends in his life and must be avoided. Fourth: If the dreamer falls into a well with no water in it, this indicates illness and loss of money. Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream for a married woman: A married woman sees many dreams in her dream, including seeing a well or falling into it, so she resorts to the Internet to obtain interpretations and details. About this dream, and here we will tell the married woman all the interpretations of the dream to see the well, which are as follows: When a married woman sees a deep well in her dream, this is a sign of family stability and understanding between her and her husband. If the well’s water is clean, but if the well’s water is impure, this indicates However, she will face some problems in her life. As for falling in a dream for a married woman, it indicates exhaustion, illness, and loss, and this God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if she sees herself digging a well, then this dream is a sign of the responsibility and difficulties she faces, but she will be able to do so, God willing. Also, seeing a well in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of bad company in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a well in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a well in a dream for an unmarried girl has many interpretations. And some of them

Your image is upside down in the well, as this is a sign of sadness, destruction, or death, and this is God, the highest and best. Interpretation of a dream about falling into a well: A dream or dream is considered a successive series of events that a person sees during his sleep, as the dream differs from one person to another according to the psychological state. First: When you dream that you Falling into a deep well, this indicates the exhaustion and tension that she is going through during this period. Second: If an unmarried girl sees me falling into a hole or a well, this is a sign to her that she is thinking a lot about her future affairs. Third: A man falling into a well in a dream indicates the presence of... Bad friends in his life and must be avoided. Fourth: If the dreamer falls into a well with no water in it, this indicates illness and loss of money. As for falling in a dream for a married woman, it indicates exhaustion, illness, and loss, and this God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of seeing a cracked mobile screen in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cracked mobile screen in a dream, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Mobile phones have become a part of everyone’s life, and many people use them on a daily basis and cannot do without them. There are many feelings and thoughts that the mind retains during periods of using mobile phones, so phones may appear Mobile phones appear in dreams often and cause many different impressions to the dreamer. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a cell phone. In a dream, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cracked mobile screen in a dream. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi confirmed that seeing a cracked or broken phone in a dream means that the dreamer is hiding secret and dangerous news and cannot reveal it to those around him. As for the only girl whose screen was broken in her dream A group of translators have confirmed that this indicates a difficult financial loss that will burden the foresight. Which will make her suffer from a difficult circumstance. She must have patience and strength to overcome this obstacle peacefully. This vision also shows that the unmarried girl faces many difficult and distressing problems and pressures that destroy the human spirit. Also, seeing a cracked mobile phone screen in anyone’s dream means that The dreamer will waste his time on trivial, baseless things in life. Likewise, when a girl in her dream sees the screen of her important mobile phone broken and she does not have the desire and ability to fix it, this indicates, according to Sheikh Al-Asqalani, that the dreamer will do so. She has a golden opportunity that will change the course of her life for the better and for the better, but unfortunately she will miss it. Seeing a mobile phone screen exploding in anyone’s dream also indicates that according to the opinion of Sheikh Al-Zahir, the dreamer will receive very wonderful news that will make her life wonderful, good and stable in all aspects. . It will also relieve you of all the worries, sorrow, and stress that you suffered before seeing this vision. Seeing a cracked mobile screen in a dream contains many meanings, interpretations, connotations, and interpretations, because the mobile phone is essential in human life, where we place all important and necessary personal things with great value. Therefore, in the following lines, we will discuss several interpretations and clarifications related to this vision. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a broken mobile phone screen in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen - confirmed by Sheikh Ibn Shaheen, a symbol of giving and glory in the field of dream interpretation. Seeing a cracked mobile phone screen in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will face a lot of pressures, adversities, and psychological difficulties. God knows best. Also, seeing a single girl buying a new mobile phone in her dream means that God will bless her with a wonderful job opportunity with a good monthly balance as soon as possible. Just like an unmarried girl when she sees cracks in her mobile phone screen in her dream, this indicates that she will receive very wonderful news, all Pleasures that will make her life more wonderful and less than it was, and God bless her. The good and righteous young man who wants to marry her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a broken mobile screen

title: Seeing raw eggs in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing raw eggs in a dream for a single girl: Seeing raw eggs in an unmarried girl’s dream means success and excellence in study and reaching the highest academic ranks. The vision also shows that the girl is trying and trying to achieve her goals and desires. Seeing eggs in a dream in general for a single girl, symbolizes goodness and blessings. In her life. As for the unmarried girl who sees herself in a dream eating raw eggs, it is an indication that he has chosen the wrong path to follow, which collects prohibited money. The vision of buying healthy eggs in an unmarried girl’s dream is considered a good vision. This means that the girl will get married. From a wealthy and respectable man. An unmarried girl who dreams of seeing raw egg yolks while she is sleeping means that her behavior is not good, and others are talking badly about her. She must stop her bad deeds and get closer to God Almighty. As for those who see a large amount of raw eggs in a dream Good news is that she will meet a suitable young man who will love her and propose to her. A girl watches herself buying raw eggs and then cooking them in a dream. This means that she is seeking to change her life for the better. As for seeing broken raw eggs in an unmarried girl’s dream, it is an unpleasant vision. Because it indicates that the dreamer cares. By speaking badly to others, not to herself or her future, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about eggs for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing raw eggs in a dream for a married woman. Seeing raw eggs in a dream for a married woman. It is a major crisis or disaster in the life of the dreamer, and he must face it with all courage, by God. I know. A married woman saw a broken raw egg in a dream. It is a warning vision for her to realize the problems she has in reality and need to solve them. And when a married woman sees that raw eggs fall from her hand, and they break in a dream. This dream means that she suffers from the envy of her relatives To her. For a married woman who dreams of picking raw eggs in a dream, this is a good sign. Based on this, she will hear the news of her pregnancy, which she has been waiting for for years. Whoever sees buying raw eggs in a dream, they are white and red. It is a metaphor for making changes to her home, changing the furniture, even You feel renewed. As for seeing broken raw eggs in a married woman’s dream, it is a symbol of the existence of a problem between her and her husband that threatens the stability of their lives and their children, and God knows best. If a married woman sees him buying raw eggs in a dream, this means that she lives a happy, stable, and peaceful life with her husband. Interpretation Seeing raw eggs in a dream about a man and its meaning When a man sees raw eggs in his dream. It is a big sign that he is in trouble, and God knows best. As for a married man who dreams of picking raw eggs in a dream. It is good news about his wife’s pregnancy. And if someone sees that he is collecting Raw eggs in his workplace in a dream. This means that he will achieve great financial benefit. And if a man sees the yolk of an egg in a dream and it is raw. It means that he will suffer from a serious illness, and God knows best. Seeing broken eggs in a man’s house in a dream. It is a metaphor for the presence of envy in his home. It indicates that the seer

title: The 50 most important interpretations of oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing oil in a dream is one of the visions around which there is a lot of controversy for many reasons, as not all oils are of the same grade, as we find that there is a big difference between the types of oil and depending on the raw materials they are made of, as well as depending on the use. It can be a cooking oil, hair oil or conditioner. Therefore, we find that the interpretations differed somewhat, but what does it mean to see oil in general? Interpretation of a dream about oil in a dream: Oil symbolizes a simple person who does not know how to twist and who is easy to confront without feeling ashamed or anxious, or a person who looks at things simply, and obstacles do not prevent him. ​​He achieves his goals, problems do not spoil his life, and he does not allow anything to disturb his mood. It also indicates the dreamer’s secret desire to wake up one day to find that all worries, obsessions, and complex issues have been forgotten and that his life will begin again without difficulties or bad psychological pressures. If the oil he saw in his dream was massage oil, then this indicates calm, comfort, and the emotions raging inside him that he wants to show to his life partner. But if he saw oil, this is a sign of wealth, profit, and making new investment deals. The vision is also a warning to the pioneer against wasting money. Or it is spent on useless things. Oil can be a cure for a disease, a cure for toxins, or a good and blessing. It is said that oil can symbolize a person’s surname or the name of a city that people frequent. For example, in the country of Egypt, there is the city of Kafr El-Zayat, and there are families called Al-Zayat, and therefore the oil in a dream could be a reflection of the daily events that the viewer experiences, and the subconscious mind was interested in storing them and bringing them out in the form of symbols. Seeing it indicates insight, and moving on the right path. And following the light that comes from righteousness and piety. Al-Nabulsi believes that consuming oil may indicate the presence of a malicious act or sorcery. However, if the fortuneteller drinks olive oil, this is a sign of lawful money, long life, health, seeking knowledge, and performing duties. Bad oil, if it is sluggish or spoiled, indicates On non-compliance, tendency toward taboos, and failure to fulfill promises. However, if spoiled oil turns into well-made oil, this indicates an unstable state, purity, and goodness. Praiseworthy possession and transactions. It is said that seeing baby oil in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer has become immersed in life and its pursuits, forgetting himself and neglecting the joyful voice of the child within him, and therefore needs to take a vacation or leave to travel, to rest. And enjoy your time away from the pressures of work and endless demands. According to Miller’s Encyclopedia, we find the following: Oil indicates high status, power, and high places. If he sees that he has been anointed with it, this indicates a lot of profit, excellence, achieving goals, and a change in position. Selling oil indicates On a miserable failure, return, failure with a partner, and the end of love. And if he sees linseed oil in a dream or feels that the

title: Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a pregnant woman by senior imams 2021

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a pregnant woman: the secret of every woman’s beauty. Long hair and long hair are considered among the secrets of women’s beauty, as the length and health of hair is considered one of the most important characteristics of a woman, and hair is considered the favorite of many men. . Today and until today, we will talk about different interpretations of a dream about long hair for a pregnant woman. What is the interpretation of dream interpretation that our scholars follow? Interpretation of a dream about long hair in general by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing long hair in a dream is evidence of the coming of goodness and abundant livelihood that the dreamer may acquire soon. The scholar Ibn Sirin also interpreted a dream about long hair as a sign of health and recovery from illness if the dreamer is a person suffering from an illness. Among the interpretations of long hair in a dream is hearing good news and joy for the dreamer, and God knows best. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a person is that his hair is long. He is soft throughout his life and enjoys good health. As for someone who dreams that his hair is curly, this indicates that there are some differences in his environment and that he is suffering from stress and tension. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Al-Nabulsi: As for Al-Nabulsi, he interpreted seeing long hair in a dream as a sign of abundant nutrition and health for the dreamer. He also explained that whoever is accustomed to To comb his braided hair, this indicates that he is a person who protects it. Money and that he behaves well in his life’s affairs. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams of long hair in a dream, this means that the marriage of this unmarried woman is near and she will live with her husband a life full of happiness, stability and comfort and it will save her from the worries and problems in her life. . Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman: If a married woman dreams of long hair, this indicates the absence of her husband from her and the instability of marital life, and the husband’s absence depends on the length of the hair, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a pregnant woman: One of the most important interpretations of a dream about long hair. For a pregnant woman: Seeing long hair for a pregnant woman indicates that she will be free from the stress and difficulties of pregnancy, and it also indicates that she will give birth to good offspring that will make her happy, and she will also obtain a lot of goodness, blessings and happiness. Also, seeing long hair in a dream may mean the approaching The date of birth may indicate that the sex of the fetus is a girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams of seeing long hair in a dream, this indicates a lot of sustenance, whether that sustenance is in the form of money or work. But if a girl dreams of seeing long hair in a dream, this indicates a lot of sustenance, whether that sustenance is in the form of money or work. If a divorced woman has curly hair, this means that there are problems and fears in her life, and no matter how difficult it is to comb this hair, it will be a way to get rid of these worries and problems. Other interpretations of seeing long hair in a dream: After we talked about the interpretation of a dream about long hair for a pregnant woman, we will take a look On some other interpretations related to long hair: The scholar Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing long hair in a dream is a praiseworthy dream that indicates kindness, blessing, and happiness, and the extent of this kindness.
